title: 3 Acre Coconut Land For Sale Kalpitiya
details:
Property Ref :Nuzr4

This is a 3 acre coconut estate 10 minutes from the Kalpitiya town center. The land is populated with yielding coconut trees and has very fertile soil.

Average harvest is 1500-2000 coconuts and if maintained the estate could yield 3000 coconuts every 45 days. The land is ideal for other agriculture purposes as well.

The land comes with-

- Clear deed and title
- Electricity
- Drinking Water
- Good road access
- Fully fenced

Asking price LKR 2.5 M/ Acre

If interested please contact us on 0094 77 77 33 823 for further details.

Thanks for looking :)
